LAUDO MÉDICO
Consultório Data de Emissão: 06/03/2023
Endereço: Rua Alcídio Viana, 916, Sala 1004, São José dos Pinhais - PR
Telefone: (41) 99718-1921
Dr.(a) NICOLLE ROSSONI RUEDAS CRM: 43424 - PR
CPF: 06640286912
Paciente: Renan Silva Oliveira Idade: 35
To whom it may concern,
I am writing to provide you with information about the medication that Mr. Renan Silva Oliveira has been prescribed and
which it is important for him to continue taking. The medication is Escitalopram Oxalate (Lexapro or similar) and it is being
used to treat generalized anxiety disorder (ICD-10 F41.1).
The medication dosage and frequency has been prescribed specifically for the patient, and it is important that he take it
exactly as prescribed – 1 tablet of 10mg per day. Failure to take the medication as directed could result in the patient's
condition returning or worsening.
Thank you for your attention to this matter. Please do not hesitate to contact me if you require any additional information
about the patient's medication.
Sincerely,
Nicolle Rossoni Ruedas, M.D. (CRM-PR 43.424)
+55 41 9 8718 1921
nicolleruedas@gmail.com
Laudo Médico
